nodes.text: The Bantha Poodoo was an LAAT/i gunship used during the Clone Wars.
This gunship had customized nose art of a flying bantha dropping a pair of bombs.

The Bantha Poodoo was stationed in the Jedi Temple at the time Jedi Master Plo Koon watched an infiltration party depart for their mission to rescue Master Even Piell from the Separatist prison known as the Citadel.
"Bantha Poodoo," after which the ship was named, is commonly used as a "swear word" in the Star Wars Galaxy. This is exhibited in characters such as the podracer, Sebulba.
